title: The Daily: Binance pays $283 million in compensation following Friday’s depegs, bitcoin recovers above $114,000 as crypto market stabilizes after historic wipeout, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: 'I Am Your Champion': Nigel Farage Makes Case for UK Crypto Reform
contentSnippet: Reform UK leader Nigel Farage said that Britain needs better crypto regulation—and suggested that he's the man to do the job.

title: Nobel Laureate’s Wartime Story Calls Crypto ‘Best Proof’ Money Has Long Been Virtual
contentSnippet: Published months before the award, Krasznahorkai’s story depicts a wounded soldier reflecting on crypto, blockchain, and faith.

title: Bitcoin, mining stocks and gold regain footing as Trump walks back tariff threats
contentSnippet: Bitcoin reclaimed the $114,000 level as global markets staged a broad recovery led by U.S. equities and gold.

title: Researchers Show That Hundreds of Bad Samples Can Corrupt Any AI Model
contentSnippet: A study found that just 250 poisoned documents were enough to corrupt AI models up to 13 billion parameters in size, showcasing the need for new kinds of defenses.

title: California Enacts First US Rules for AI 'Companion' Chatbots
contentSnippet: Governor Gavin Newsom signs SB 243, requiring emotional AI chatbots to identify themselves as artificial and limit sensitive exchanges with minors.

title: Strategy Spent Another $27 Million on Bitcoin Before It Crashed
contentSnippet: Strategy purchased 220 Bitcoin for an average price of $123,500 last week, apparently ahead of the coin's price plunge on Friday.

title: WazirX Secures Court Approval for Debt Restructuring Plan
contentSnippet: The Singapore High Court has given the green light to the exchange's recovery scheme after 95.7% of creditors backed the plan.

title: XLM Rises 6% to Recover From Weekend Plunge
contentSnippet: Stellar posts dramatic intraday recovery from $0.33 support to $0.35 resistance as institutional money flows in.

title: Strategy Bought $27M in Bitcoin at $123K Before Crypto Crash
contentSnippet: The firm acquired BTC at an average price of over $123,000, while the crypto was trading well below $110,000 during last week's carnage.

title: ‘Wake-up call’: After $500 billion crypto crash, analysts warn market reset exposes leverage risks
contentSnippet: President Trump's latest tariff threats against China caused the crypto market to plummet 10% heading into the weekend.

title: HBAR Rises Past Key Resistance After Explosive Decline
contentSnippet: HBAR surged past key resistance at $0.19 amid a dramatic volume spike, signaling renewed institutional interest and reinforcing bullish momentum after a 9% recovery stretch.

title: Project 0 Integrates Solana DeFi giant Kamino in boost to liquidity
contentSnippet: Solana-based liquidity layer Kamino is integrating crypto prime broker Project 0 to unlock cross-margin lending using a single pool of credit.

title: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink: Bitcoin and Crypto 'Serve Same Purpose as Gold'
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s CEO walked back 2017 comments on Bitcoin in a recent interview and said he now sees it as a legitimate alternative asset.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin and Altcoins Recover After $500B Crash
contentSnippet: Bitcoin derivatives show renewed optimism after a leverage flush, with open interest and basis rebounding, while options traders tilt bullish as funding rates diverge across exchanges.

title: Binance Reimburses $283M After Market Crash and Asset Depegging Issues
contentSnippet: The exchange said it fully compensated users within 24 hours after USDe, BNSOL, and wBETH briefly depegged during Friday’s market turmoil.

title: Dogecoin Foundation’s corporate arm to go public via merger with esports company Brag House Holdings
contentSnippet: Brag House's Nasdaq-listed stock is down 60% to $0.97 per share, giving the company a market cap of around $10 million.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF Investments Have Already Topped 2024—Will It Last?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs attracted $3.17 billion last week, pushing the year's crypto fund flows above last year's mark.

title: Investment Bank China Renaissance Plans $600M BNB Treasury With YZi Labs: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: The proposed investment vehicle would be a publicly traded US company designed to buy and hold BNB, marking one of the largest single bets on BNB by a publicly listed entity.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Adds $838 Million More in Ethereum Amid Market Chaos
contentSnippet: Publicly traded BitMine Immersion Technologies bumped its Ethereum stash to $12.5 billion, buying the dip amid recent market volatility.

title: Ripple and Immunefi launch ‘Attackathon’ aimed at securing proposed XRPL lending protocol
contentSnippet: The protocol is expected to go to a validator vote later this year, introducing pooled lending and underwritten credit natively on the XRPL.

title: BitMine’s Ethereum holdings top 3 million ETH after latest multi-million dollar purchase
contentSnippet: BitMine's total crypto and cash holdings have now hit $12.9 billion, and the company owns more than 2.5% of Ethereum’s circulating supply.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Bought the Dip, Adding Over 200K ETH to Ethereum Treasury
contentSnippet: The firm's ether holdings crossed 3 million tokens, halfway through its goal to corner 5% of the crypto's supply.

title: WazirX Restructuring Cleared in Massive Relief for $230M Hack Victims
contentSnippet: The sanction order followed an August re-vote that saw 95.7% of creditors by number and 94.6% by value support the plan.

title: Hacker-linked wallets dumped and rebought ETH during market wipeout, losing $5.5 million: Lookonchain
contentSnippet: During the weekend’s historic crypto liquidation, wallets labeled as "hackers" by Arkham suffered about $5.5 million from selling ETH low and rebuying high.

title: ‘Don’t stop ₿elievin’: Strategy spends $27 million on more bitcoin as total holdings reach 640,250 BTC
contentSnippet: Strategy's bitcoin holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million BTC supply — worth around $73 billion.

title: Recovery After $500B Crash Sets Stage for Q4 Rebound: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 13, 2025

title: China Renaissance in talks to raise $600 million for US-listed BNB treasury vehicle: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: The Beijing-based and Hong Kong-listed investment seeks to raise $600 million with CZ's YZi Labs to invest in BNB through a U.S.-traded DAT.

title: Hyperliquid’s HIP-3 Upgrade to Unlock Permissionless Perp Market Creation
contentSnippet: The upgrade marks a major step toward decentralizing Hyperliquid’s derivatives infrastructure, giving builders the ability to launch perpetual futures markets directly onchain.

title: Synthetix Soars 120% as Derivatives Hype Reignites DeFi’s 'Dino Coin'
contentSnippet: The DeFi veteran’s 120% surge comes ahead of a new perpetuals DEX launch and a high-profile trading competition that could reignite interest in legacy protocols.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s gambling watchdog is reviewing FIFA’s “Right to Buy” NFTs, while noting no wrongdoing has been alleged.

title: Judge tosses lawsuit against Yuga Labs over failure to satisfy Howey test
contentSnippet: The plaintiffs failed to show how Bored Ape Yacht Club and other NFTs represent investment contracts under the SEC's 3-pronged Howey Test.

title: Bitcoin on TV: How shows like South Park influence crypto
contentSnippet: "South Park" is back to roasting crypto in its recent episode, but digital assets like Bitcoin have been a pop culture punchline for a long time.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: Base NFTs overtake rivals in sales count led by AI trading game: DappRadar
contentSnippet: Base’s DX Terminal NFTs ranked first in sales counts, having 1.27 million transactions, a more than 1,000% increase over the previous month.

title: Early Hyperliquid user sells airdropped Hypurr NFT for $467K
contentSnippet: Early Hyperliquid users have been rewarded with a massive Hypurr NFT airdrop, with the free digital cats now worth over $64,000.

title: Hester Peirce discusses her future NFT plans after serving at SEC
contentSnippet: She said she was joking about “becoming an NFT creator” after her time at the SEC; the commissioner signaled she was working “to get crypto policy right” first.

title: Vesting NFTs top daily sales volume chart: CryptoSlam
contentSnippet: Vesting NFTs jumped to the top of CryptoSlam’s daily sales chart on BNB Chain, highlighting demand for liquidity solutions in token lockups.
